--- title: "World Health 2020 STATS" author: "Mburu" date: "2023-02-11" output: html_document: toc: true toc_depth: 2 toc_float: collapsed: false smooth_scroll: false theme: united highlight: pygments --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(data.table) library(DT) library(ggthemes) library(leaflet) library(ggmap) library(plotly) library(lubridate) adolescentBirthRate <- fread("data/adolescentBirthRate.csv") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} old_nms <- names(adolescentBirthRate) old_nms ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "Location" "Period" "Indicator" "First Tooltip" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} old_nms <- old_nms %>% tolower() old_nms <- gsub("\\s", "_", old_nms) old_nms ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "location" "period" "indicator" "first_tooltip" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} names(adolescentBirthRate) <- old_nms head(adolescentBirthRate, 10) %>% datatable() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ea_country <- c("Kenya", "Uganda", "Tanzania") ea_data <- adolescentBirthRate[location %in% ea_country ] p = ggplot(ea_data, aes(period, first_tooltip, group = location, color = location) ) + geom_line(sizee = 1)+ theme_hc()+ labs(title = "", x = "Year", y = "%")+ scale_color_viridis_d(name="") p ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](who_stats_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
